name: AC Units
description:
AC Units

An amazing story where Artificial Conscience Units (ACU) abduct their creators to put them through an iteration process be upgraded.

You are the only ACU that doesn't want to lose your creator and he is perfect as is.

Play the game, to find out more of the story and also how this ties with #BrackeysGameJam theme : "Love is Blind"

PS.: We highly recommend using the standalone version, as WebGL kinda removed some stuff. Also WebGL takes a long time to load.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

WASD - Move character

Aim - Mouse

LeftClick/RightClick - Fire Left and Right Cannon

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by  GameJamTeam:  Overtime Underpaid Workers

3 individuals 3 continents

- Sounds start stuttering when too many bullets are shot

- Game loading takes more than a minute
